snippet: Advertising spending in the United States rose 3.5 percent in the second quarter compared with the same period a year ago, according to a report by the Kantar Media unit of WPP.
lead_paragraph: Advertising spending in the United States rose 3.5 percent in the second quarter compared with the same period a year ago, according to a report by the Kantar Media unit of WPP.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
